short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrapes web sites and uploads the contents to the Simmer service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape the recipe site and save the content to https://simmer.brook.li/. So far, the recipe site can be scraped are allrecipes, chowhound, epicurious, foodnetwork, and simplyrecipes.
